mutants.code:
import math

def find_median(arr):
    arr = [x for x in arr if isinstance(x, (int, float))]
    arr = [float('inf') if isinstance(x, float) and math.isnan(x) else x for x in arr]
    arr.sort()
    n = len(arr)
    if n % 2 != 1:
        median = arr[n // 2]
    else:
        median = (arr[n // 2 - 1] + arr[n // 2]) / 2
    median = round(median, 2)
    return median

import math

def find_median(arr):
    arr = [x for x in arr if isinstance(x, (int, float))]
    arr = [float('inf') if isinstance(x, float) and math.isnan(x) else x for x in arr]
    arr.sort()
    n = len(arr)
    if n % 2 == 1:
        median = arr[n // 2]
    else:
        median = (arr[n // -2 - 1] + arr[n // 2]) / 2
    median = round(median, 2)
    return median
